name: Storm
text: Weather Control - Action: Swap your [[WEATHER]] support in play with a support of your choice from the [[WEATHER]] deck. Resolve the "Special" ability on your [[WEATHER]] support in play. (Limit once per round).

name: Ororo Munroe
text: Ororo Munroe begins the game with a [[WEATHER]] deck. (see insert.) "I fell a storm comming..." - Setup: Choose a support from the [[WEATHER]] deck and put it into play.

name: Clear Skies
text: Permanent. Each character gains stalwart. Special: Draw 1 card.

name: Hurricane
text: Permanent. Each character gains retaliate 1. Special: Remove 2 threat from a scheme.

name: Thunderstorm
text: Permanent. Each character gets +1 ATK. Special: Deal 2 damage to an enemy.

name: Blizzard
text: Permanent. Each character gets -1 ATK. Special: Choose a non-[[ELITE]] minion → until the end of the round, treat that minion's text box as if it were blank (except for TRAITS).

name: Storm's Crown
text: Storm gets +1 THW. Hero Resource: Exhaust Storm's Crown → generate the printed resource on your [[WEATHER]] support.

name: Storm's Cape
text: Storm gets +1 DEF and gains the [[AERIAL]] trait. Hero Response: After you resolve the "Special" ability on your [[WEATHER]] support, exhaust Storm's Cape → ready Storm.

name: Ororo's Garden
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Ororo's Garden → heal 2 damage from you identity.

name: Weather Goddess
text: Hero Action: Swap your [[WEATHER]] support in play with a support of your choice from the [[WEATHER]] deck. Resolve the "Special" ability on your [[WEATHER]] support in play.

name: Torrential Rain
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from among schemes in play. If Hurricane is in play, resolve its "Special" ability.

name: Lightning Bolt
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 8 damage to an enemy. If Thunderstorm is in play, resolve its "Special" ability.

name: Flash Freeze
text: Hero Interrupt: When the villain attacks you, the villain and each minion engaged with you get -3 ATK while attacking you this phase. If Blizzard is in play, resolve its "Special" ability.

name: Blast of Wind
text: Hero Action: Choose a player → deal 3 damage to the villain and each minion engaged with that player. Resolve the "Special" ability of your [[WEATHER]] support.

name: Havok
text: [star] Forced Interrupt: When Havok attacks, discard the top card of the encounter deck. For each boost icon ([boost]) discarded this way, Havok gets +1 ATK for this attack and takes +1 consequential damage ([consequential]).

name: Mirage
text: Response: After Mirage enters play, choose an enemy whose SCH is less than Mirage's THW → stun that enemy.

name: Gentle
text: [star] Gentle takes +1 consequential damage ([consequential]) after he attacks the villain.

name: Pixie
text: Response: After you play Pixie from your hand, add an [[X-MEN]] ally from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Uncanny X-Men
text:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 [[TEAM]] card per player.
Each of your [[X-MEN]] allies gets +1 hit point. If each of your characters has the [[X-MEN]] trait, each of your [[X-MEN]] allies costs 1 fewer resource to play.

name: Leadership Skill
text: Uses (3 leadership counters). Max 1 per player. Interrupt: When an ally makes a basic thwart or basic attack action, remove 1 leadership counter from here → that ally gets +1 THW and +1 ATK for that action.

name: "To Me, My X-Men!"
text: Play only if your identity has the [[X-MEN]] trait.Hero Action: Search the top 5 cards of your deck for an [[X-MEN]] ally and put it into play. If that ally is still in play at the end of the phase, add it to your hand.

name: Forge
text: Response: After Forge enters play, search your deck and discard pile for an [[X-MEN]] or [[X-FORCE]] support and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.)

name: Endurance
text:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player.
You get +3 hit points.

name: Hangar Bay
text: Max 1 per player. Response: After an ally defends against an attack and is not defeated, exhaust this card → ready that ally.
